attributes.action: exclude anyone under the age of 18 to enter public houses regardless if accompanied by an adult
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last few years i have personally seen young single parents trundle their children into public houses so as to drink in front of them.Most of these are single parent young girls on benefit,surely this money should be to help children not to be wasted on alcohol.By passing legislation to exclude under 18s from all licenced premises would go some way to educating parents that the care of your child comes before a trip to the pub.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
